HOW IT WORKS

Three steps. No trust falls. No group hugs. Just the paperwork rage deserves.

(Rage Intake). List your grievances. There are no character limits. We tried adding one and the form fought back.

02
🖨

Via dot matrix printer. The sound alone is therapeutic. Your appointment exists on paper because rage is physical.

03
💥

SCREAM UNTIL HONEST

Until the fluorescent lights feel honest. Until your jaw unclenches. Until you remember you have a body and it is furious.

"I'm a librarian. I have shushed over forty thousand people in my career. Do you know what it's like to enforce silence for twenty-three years and never once be asked how loud you need to be? My first session, I screamed so hard the dot matrix printer in the lobby jammed. They framed the printout. It's still on the wall."

— PATRON #4471, PUBLIC SECTOR

"I booked the Couples Rage Sync with my wife. We've been in couples therapy for two years, learning to use 'I feel' statements. In forty-five minutes of scheduled screaming, we resolved more than twelve sessions of validating each other's inner child. Turns out our inner children were just angry."

— PATRON #2208, JOINT FILING
— this one made me cry in the supply closet

"My manager kept scheduling 'vibe checks' at 4:55 PM on Fridays. I did three Express Fury sessions in one week. The following Monday, when she said 'let's circle back,' I felt nothing. Not peace — just the beautiful absence of the urge to flip a table. That's healing."

— PATRON #0093, CORPORATE SECTOR

A NOTE FROM AGNES

Last year, I screamed at a Tupperware party. Not because of the Tupperware — the lids were fine. I screamed because the host asked us to go around the circle and share what we were grateful for, and I realized I'd been performing gratitude for eleven years while my jaw was clenched so tight I cracked a molar. So I screamed. And every woman in that living room put down her catalog and exhaled. That exhale is what I'm selling. That exhale is the whole company.

RagefulResolutions.com is not affiliated with SynergyCorp, its Gratitude Circles, or its trust falls. Form 7-R is not legally binding but emotionally necessary. All screaming sessions are conducted in soundproofed rooms by certified professionals. No fluorescent lights are harmed during sessions (they were already hurting you).
